projects.headline: Registration System
projects.description: Collaborated on building a global registration system for an interfaith organization
workDone: Developed and optimized dynamic registration forms for user-friendly experience
Implemented responsive UI/UX design ensuring seamless functionality across devices
Ensured accessibility compliance and best practices for inclusive design

projects.headline: Language Service Solutions
projects.description: Implemented and maintained a pixel-perfect front-end design for the LSS website, ensuring responsiveness and design consistency based on provided assets.
workDone: Modernized web stack to improve website performance, have better web vitals, and overall modern look and feel

projects.headline: Cafe Rustico
projects.description: Designed, developed, and integrated a user-friendly CMS to streamline content management, enabling the cafe to easily update and maintain their website.
workDone: Led UI/UX design for an engaging, user-friendly website
Integrated a Content Management System (CMS) for easy website updates and content management
